languages.text: "Предпочту не утомлять вас своими спекуляциями на этот счет. Доставьте мне пленных для допроса, а я поделюсь с вами сообщенными ими сведениями".
"The reasons behind their machinations would be pure speculation at this point. Bring me prisoners to interrogate and perhaps we will gain some much needed insight."
languages.original_text: "Предпочту не утомлять вас своими спекуляциями на этот счет. Доставьте мне пленных для допроса, а я поделюсь с вами сообщенными ими сведениями".

traits.locale_text: "I prefer not to burden you with my speculations on that point. Bring me prisoners to interrogate and I will share with you the information they divulge."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

traits.locale_text: "I prefer not to burden you with my speculations on that point. Bring me prisoners to interrogate and I will share with you the information they divulge."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

traits.locale_text: "I prefer not to burden you with my speculations on that point. Bring me prisoners to interrogate and I will share with you the information they divulge."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

traits.locale_text: "The reasons behind their machinations would be pure speculation at this point. Bring me prisoners to interrogate and perhaps we will gain some much needed insight."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: “阴谋背后的原因，目前我们恐怕只能主观臆想。若是能抓到俘虏，交给我进行审讯，或许我们会得到某些急需的情报。”
languages.original_text: "The reasons behind their machinations would be pure speculation at this point. Bring me prisoners to interrogate and perhaps we will gain some much needed insight."

traits.locale_text: “关于这个问题，我就不胡乱猜测，增加你的负担了。只要你能把俘虏带回来交给我审问，我就会告知你他们透露了什么情报。”
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: «En estos momentos, los motivos de sus maquinaciones no son más que especulaciones. Tráigame prisioneros que interrogar y tal vez descubramos la información que necesitamos».
languages.original_text: "The reasons behind their machinations would be pure speculation at this point. Bring me prisoners to interrogate and perhaps we will gain some much needed insight."

traits.locale_text: «Preferiría no incomodarle con meras especulaciones al respecto. Si me trae prisioneros que interrogar, compartiré la información que proporcionen».
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: 「彼らの策略の背後にある理由は、この段階では単なる憶測に過ぎない。囚人を連れてきて尋問すれば、必要な情報を得られるかもしれない」
languages.original_text: "The reasons behind their machinations would be pure speculation at this point. Bring me prisoners to interrogate and perhaps we will gain some much needed insight."

traits.locale_text: 「彼らの策略の背後にある理由は、この段階では単なる憶測に過ぎない。囚人を連れてきて尋問すれば、必要な情報を得られるかもしれない」
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: « À ce stade, nous ne pouvons qu'émettre des suppositions quant aux raisons de leurs machinations. Si vous m'amenez des prisonniers à interroger, nous obtiendrons peut-être de précieux renseignements qui éclaireront notre lanterne. »
languages.original_text: "The reasons behind their machinations would be pure speculation at this point. Bring me prisoners to interrogate and perhaps we will gain some much needed insight."

traits.locale_text: « Je préfère ne pas vous embarrasser avec mes spéculations. Amenez-moi des prisonniers à interroger, et je vous transmettrai les informations qu'ils me dévoileront. »
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: "Über die Gründe für ihre Intrigen können wir nur spekulieren. Bringt mir Gefangene, die ich verhören kann, dann erhalten wir vielleicht Einblicke."
languages.original_text: "The reasons behind their machinations would be pure speculation at this point. Bring me prisoners to interrogate and perhaps we will gain some much needed insight."

traits.locale_text: "Ich würde Euch lieber nicht mit meinen Spekulationen darüber belasten. Bringt mir Gefangene zum Verhör, und ich werde mit Euch teilen, was sie zu sagen haben."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: "Elimizde bilgi yokken çevirdikleri işlerin ardındaki sebebi aramak nafile. Sorguya çekebileceğim tutsaklar getirirsen belki ihtiyacımız olan malumatı edinebiliriz."
languages.original_text: "The reasons behind their machinations would be pure speculation at this point. Bring me prisoners to interrogate and perhaps we will gain some much needed insight."
